channel.title: docker-compose on Xiao.chen
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on Xiao.chen

item.title: Launch and setup the ELK stack use docker compose service
item.description: install ELK stack use docker-compose Install and setup ELK stack in single machine use docker compose service. and uesfilebeat ship the logs settings the centos system 1sudo yum install -y yum-utils 2sudo yum-config-manager \ 3 --add-repo \ 4 https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo 5sudo yum install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io 6systemctl enable docker 7systemctl start docker 8# install the docker-compose 9sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 10chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 11 12# adjust the system parmeters 13echo "vm.
